name: SturmFront - The Mutant War
description:
• The first stage is more accessible
  • You have more "Energy".
  • Defense bombs are now Shields (Changed the "B" to a "S")
  • You are dead if you have no "Energy". You can´t refill you Energytank with a Shield anymore.
  • Explosions from red barrels are bigger.

Support SturmFront - The Mutant War on Steam Greenlight:
